mapper.select: select E_KEY_FK as"eKey" ,comm_date as "inDate",to_char(comm_intime,'hh:mm:ss') as "strInTime" ,to_char(comm_outtime,'hh:mm:ss') as "strOutTime" from commute where C_KEY_FK = ${cKeyFk} and to_char(comm_date,'dd') = to_char(sysdate,'dd')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUTE VALUES(SEQ_COMMUTE.NEXTVAL, ${cKeyFk}, ${eKey}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE SET COMM_OUTTIME= SYSDATE WHERE to_number(to_char(comm_date, 'dd')) = to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'dd')) and E_KEY_FK = ${eKey} and C_KEY_FK = ${cKeyFk}
